description:
Sitri saves the day. Flustered, the Akashic Tower`s members ignore Sophia`s orders and self-destruct. As Sitri has figured out their headquarters, the hunters press on. Flick uses his lightning spell on them all, and for a moment it seems it`s all over...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Rush in When It`s Over
Je veux me pointer qu`à la fin
終わった頃に駆けつけたい
